duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate mobile equipment such as lift trucks, overhead cranes, track mobiles/switch engine, and/or yard vehicles to move materials and products between workstations and/or receiving and storage locations.
Inspect equipment at the start of each shift and record all required data in a complete and accurate manner on daily inspection forms.
Monitor equipment to ensure it is operationally ready to minimize down-time, perform basic troubleshooting, and schedule more complicated mechanical issues with qualified vendors.
Review daily loading schedules to estimate hour requirements for completion of job assignments and suggest measures to improve processes, equipment performance, and quality.
Ensure that the shop and outside area are clean, and equipment and tools are stored at the completion of each shift.
Perform other job-related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED, Valid certificate(s) of training and applicable licenses for operation of equipment, as required.
